title: Free Playback of VOD
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is signed into an account without any credentials
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user attempts to launch VOD content within the app 

Ex: Game Highlights

title: Lock Icon on Subscriber Content
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A user is signed-in without entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user observes a game tile or hero image for a live or archived game

AND

+ The user attempts to launch the content
custom_expected:
THEN

+ A lock icon is displayed on the game tile or hero

AND

+ The paywall is displayed after the user selects the content

title: Executive Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ The user is signed into their MLB app with an executive account (No blackouts, No MVPD required)
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user attempts to launch a game that is broadcasted in a blackout area

OR 

+ The user attempts to launch a game that normally requires signing into an MVPD provider
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user is able is receive playback without being blocked by a blackout message or MVPD sign-in modal.

title: Verify Monthly Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has logged into an account with a monthly MLB.tv subscription
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user attempts to launch a live game that is not blacked out nationally or locally

OR

+ The user attempts to launch an archived game
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user should receive successful playback in both scenarios

title: Verify Yearly Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has logged into an account with a yearly MLB.tv subscription
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user attempts to launch a live game that is not blacked out nationally or locally

OR

+ The user attempts to launch an archived game
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user should receive successful playback in both scenarios

title: Verify Single-team Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has signed into a single-team user account
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Navigating to a live or archived game that includes their single-team credentials
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will receive successful playback of the broadcast for their single-team associated with their entitlements

title: Verify MVPD playback flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user does not have any MVPD entitlements linked to their account
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Attempting to launch content that requires an MVPD authentication (with MVPD pill)
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will see the MVPD messaging prompt

AND

+ The copy will display copy on how to link their MLB.tv account to their TV provider

title: Validate playback 90 minutes after game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ The user is blacked out from viewing a live game (with MVPD-auth required)
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The game has switched from Live to archive

AND

+ 90 minutes has passed 

AND

+ The user attempts to launch the game
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The game will successfully launch without an MVPD blackout message

title: FGOTD Label
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ The user has navigated to a game tile or hero section for the Free Game of the Day
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the game tile or hero section
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The MLB.tv Free Game of the Day pill will be displayed at the bottom of the tile and under the team names in the hero image

AND

+ The pill will remain on past FGOTD tiles on the Games carousel and Games page

title: Archived FGOTD
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is logged into an account

AND

+ The account may have free, at bat, single team, mlball, executive entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Launching an archived FGOTD game from the Home or Games page

title: Non-Entitled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is not logged into an account

AND

+ The user does not have a purchase linked to their Apple ID
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Navigating to the game tile or watch button on the hero section for the FGOTD
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will see a lock icon 

AND

+ Cannot launch the free game

title: In-Market Club Team Entitlement- Not Blacked out
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ a user with a single-team entitlement to one of the teams with in-market rights (COL, ARI, SD) 

AND

+ the user is physically located (or spoofed to be located) in the single team's in-market location

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN 

+ the user observes game tiles for their single team that are in the future
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN

+ the user will not observe a blackout pill on game tiles for their single team

AND

+ the user will observe that the feed select modal that appear when the game is selected does not include a lock icon for their single team's feed

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14313942)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN 

+ the user observes a game tile for their single team that is live 

NOTE: Mark this case as blocked if not readily available in PROD OR spoof this situation with proxy
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN

+ the user will not observe a blackout pill on game tiles for their single team

AND

+ the feed that comes up for their team when the game is selected does not have a lock icon

AND

+ when the user selects their teams feed they get successful playback

![](index.php?/attachments/get/14313949)

title: Blue Jays Regular Season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is logged into an international account in Canada
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user attempts to launch the Toronto Blue Jays game
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will receive a blackout message

title: Apple TV
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A game is broadcasted on Apple TV+ (Friday Night)

AND

+ The user is logged into an account overridden to an international time zone.
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user attempts to launch the stream
custom_expected:
THEN

+ An Apple TV+ specific blackout message is displayed

AND

+ The user is unable to receive Apple TV+ playback

title: Sunday Night Baseball
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. A game is broadcasted on Sunday Night Baseball

AND

1. The user is logged into an account overridden to an international time zone. 

Zones: 

“Africa”: Angola, Benin, Botswana, Burkina Faso, Burundi, Cameroon, Cape Verde, Central African Republic, Chad, Comoros, The Republic of Congo, Cote d’Ivoire, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Djibouti, Equatorial Guinea, Eritrea, Eswatini, Ethiopia, Gabon, Ghana, Guinea, Guinea Bissau, Kenya, Lesotho, Liberia, Madagascar, Malawi, Mali, Mayotte, Mozambique, Namibia, Niger, Nigeria, Reunion, Rwanda, Sao Tome & Principe, Senegal, Seychelles, Sierra Leone, Somalia, South Africa, Sudan, Tanzania & Zanzibar, The Gambia, Togo, Uganda, Zambia and Zimbabwe

“Caribbean”: Anguilla, Antigua and Barbuda, Aruba, Bahamas, Barbados, Belize, Bermuda, Bonaire, British Virgin Islands, Cayman Islands, Curacao, Dominica, Dominican Republic, Falkland Islands, French Guiana, Grenada, Guadeloupe, Guyana, Haiti, Jamaica, Montserrat, Martinique, Saba, St. Barthelemy, St. Eustatius, St. Kitts and Nevis, St. Lucia, St. Martin, St. Vincent and the Grenadines, Saint Maarten, Suriname, Trinidad and Tobago, and Turks and Caicos Islands

Mexico

“Central America”: Belize, Costa Rica, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras, Nicaragua and Panama

“South America”: Argentina, Bolivia, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Ecuador, Falkland Islands, French Guiana, Guyana, Paraguay, Peru, Surinam, Uruguay and Venezuela

“Oceania” shall mean Australia, New Zealand and the Pacific Islands

“Pacific Islands” shall mean Cook Islands, Fiji, French Polynesia, Kiribati, Marshall Islands, Micronesia, Niue, Palau Islands, Samoa, Solomon Islands, Tahiti, Tokelau, Tonga and Tuvalu

“Ireland, Netherlands, & UK”: England, Netherlands, Northern Ireland, Republic of Ireland, Scotland, and Wales
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user attempts to launch the Sunday Night Baseball game
custom_expected:
THEN

1. A blackout message should be displayed

AND

1. The user does not receive playback
